mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pitches(name, location, is_active, create_at, update_at, manager_id) VALUES( #{name},#{location},#{isActive},#{createAt}, #{updateAt}, #{managerId})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.location, p.is_active AS isActive, p.create_at AS createAt, p.update_at AS updateAt, mg.id AS managerId, mg.full_name AS managerFullname, mg.avatar AS managerAvatar, AVG(r.star) AS avgStar FROM pitches p LEFT JOIN sub_pitches sp ON sp.pitch_id = p.id LEFT JOIN users mg ON mg.id = p.manager_id LEFT JOIN reviews r ON r.pitch_id = p.id WHERE (#{keyword} IS NULL OR CONCAT(IFNULL(p.name, ''), IFNULL(p.location, ''), IFNULL(mg.full_name, '')) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND (#{managerId} IS NULL OR #{managerId} = 0 OR #{managerId} = p.manager_id) GROUP BY p.id, p.name, p.location, p.is_active, p.create_at, p.update_at, mg.id, mg.full_name, mg.avatar

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.location, p.is_active AS isActive, p.manager_id AS managerId, p.create_at AS createAt, p.update_at AS updateAt, AVG(r.star) AS avgStar FROM pitches p LEFT JOIN reviews r ON r.pitch_id = p.id WHERE p.id = #{id} GROUP BY p.id, p.name, p.location, p.is_active, p.manager_id, p.create_at, p.update_at
